body.p:
Hd Qrs 1st Ky Cav
Near Powder Springs Ga
June 27" 1864
Gov Bramlette
Sir
I have the honor to recommend to you for Promotion Major F. M Helveti to the rank of Lt Colonel vice Adams promoted also Capt A. T. Keen to the rank of Major vice Helveti promoted.

I am very Resptfy
your obt Servt
S Adams Col 1st Ky Cav

1.2.3.4.5.Maj F^rancis^ M Helviti com Lieut Col. 1 Cavy June 27 /64 vice S. Adams promoted.
1.2.3.4.5.Capt. Anderson S. Keene com Maj 1 Cavy June 27 /64 vice J. M. Helviti promoted

1 Cavy
Head Qrs. 1st Ky Cavy
nr. Powder Springs
June 27. 1864
Recommends Maj F M Helviti for promotion to Lieut Col And Capt. A. T. Keen to the rank of Major.
